metadata.title: CVE-2024-46799 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: ethernet: ti: am65-cpsw: Fix NULL dereference on XDP_TXIf number of TX queues are set to 1 we get a NULL pointerdereference during XDP_TX.~# ethtool -L eth0 tx 1~# ./xdp-trafficgen udp -A <ipv6-src> -a <ipv6-dst> eth0 -t 2Transmitting on eth0 (ifindex 2)[  241.135257] Unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference at virtualaddress 0000000000000030Fix this by using actual TX queues instead of max TX queueswhen picking the TX channel in am65_cpsw_ndo_xdp_xmit().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
